headline: How Recent Policy And Tariff Shifts Are Reframing First Solar's Story And Valuation
summary: First Solar’s internal fair value estimate has shifted only slightly, moving from about US$271.61 to roughly US$281.65, but that small change reflects a meaningful reset in how the stock’s risk and growth profile are being viewed. A marginally higher discount rate and revenue growth assumption sit alongside a new future P/E input, all informed by recent Street research that mixes confidence in U.S. policy support with concern over tariffs, booking visibility and execution risks. As these...

headline: BofA Hikes First Solar Target (FSLR) to $291, Eyeing a 2026 Stock-Picker’s Cycle
summary: First Solar Inc. (NASDAQ:FSLR) is one of the cheap stocks to buy for the next 3 years. On January 9, Bank of America raised the firm’s price target on First Solar to $291 from $255 and kept a Buy rating on the shares. Looking toward 2026, BofA described the upcoming period as a stock-picker’s cycle […]
